participant_1.name: Oliver Thompson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and confident, Oliver is always looking for new opportunities to excel in his career. He enjoys engaging in conversations about finance and investments.
participant_1.background: i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i grew up in manhattan. i drive a bmw. my parents are very wealthy bankers.

participant_2.name: Sophia Martinez
participant_2.personality: Creative and energetic, Sophia loves to express herself through dance and music. She enjoys nostalgic conversations and has a passion for retro culture.
participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i love new kids on the block.
